TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QueryStringParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 將 HTTP 要求查詢字串欄位的值繫結至參數物件。

span.span: Binds the value of an HTTP request query-string field to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用類別繫結欄位做為 HTTP 要求查詢字串的一部分使用的參數傳遞的參數型的查詢或命令的值。You can use the class to bind the value of a field that is passed as part of an HTTP request query string to a parameter that is used in a parameterized query or command. 欄位會擷取從集合。The field is retrieved from the collection. 將資料繫結至參數的控制項可能會擲回例外狀況，如果參考物件時，但沒有對應的查詢字串名稱/值組傳遞。Controls that bind data to the parameter might throw an exception if a object is referenced, but no corresponding query-string name/value pair is passed. 同樣地，它們可能會顯示任何資料，如果傳遞查詢字串欄位名稱，而且對應的值。Similarly, they might display no data if the query-string field name is passed without a corresponding value. 若要避免發生這些情況下，設定屬性適當的位置。To avoid these situations, set the property where appropriate. 類別提供屬性，其可識別要繫結至查詢字串值的名稱。The class provides the property, which identifies the name of the query string value to bind to. 它也提供之屬性的繼承自類別。It also provides the properties that are inherited from the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別不會驗證傳遞的值; 它提供未經處理的值。The class does not validate the value that is passed; it provides the raw value. 不過，您可以驗證的值資料的原始檔控制中的物件。However, you can validate the value of a object in a data source control. 若要這樣做，請處理`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`事件資料的原始檔控制，並檢查的事件處理常式的參數值。To do so, handle the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event of the data source control and check the parameter value in the event handler. 如果參數的值未通過驗證測試，您可以藉由設定取消資料作業屬性相關聯的類別`true`。If the value of the parameter does not pass the validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立物件時顯示資料，做為篩選條件使用控制項。The following example shows how to create a object to use as a filter when you display data in a control. 您將加入物件控制項的集合。You add the object to the control's collection. 名為查詢字串欄位的值的參數物件繫結`country`至其字串。The parameter object binds the value of the query-string field named `country` to its string. 因為沒有屬性指定參數，如果沒有欄位命名`country`傳遞查詢字串，控制會擲回例外狀況。Because no property is specified for the parameter, if no field named `country` is passed with the query string, the control throws a exception. 如果欄位的名稱`country`傳遞，但是沒有值，控制項會顯示沒有資料。If a field named `country` is passed but has no value, the control displays no data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4/CS/qsp4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4/VB/qsp4vb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何建立物件，以顯示使用參數化的 SQL 查詢從 Access 資料庫的資料。The following example shows how to create a object to display data from an Access database by using a parameterized SQL query. 物件擷取記錄，接著會顯示在控制項。The object retrieves records that are then displayed in a control. 控制項還編輯，而且可讓使用者更新 Northwind Traders Orders 資料表中訂單的狀態。The control is also editable, and lets users update the status of orders in the Northwind Traders Orders table. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別未命名的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new unnamed instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A使用所建立的物件建構函式會使用其所有屬性的預設值初始化。A object that is created by using the constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties. 屬性會初始化，如下所示：The properties are initialized as follows: - 會初始化為空字串 ("")。 is initialized to an empty string (""). - 會初始化為空字串 ("")。 is initialized to an empty string (""). - 初始化為 。 is initialized to . - 初始化為 。 is initialized to . - 初始化為 `null`。 is initialized to `null`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用建構函式來建立新的參數並將它加入集合控制項。The following example shows how to use the constructor to create a new parameter and add it to the collection of an control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/CS/querystrparam1cs.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/VB/querystrparam1vb.aspx.vb#2)] 物件加入至控制並宣告 ASP.NET 網頁中。The object is added to the control and is declared in an ASP.NET Web page. 控制使用控制項繫結，並且顯示資料時要求網頁包含查詢字串，其中包含名為欄位`empId`，並且對應的值。The control uses the control to bind and display data whenever the page is requested with a query string that contains a field that is named `empId` and that has a corresponding value. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/CS/querystrparam1cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/VB/querystrparam1vb.aspx#3)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the values of the instance that is specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式是用來複製的受保護的複製建構函式執行個體。The constructor is a protected copy constructor that is used to clone a instance. 值， ，和屬性傳送到新的執行個體。The values of the , , and properties are transferred to the new instance.

The default is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 使用指定的字串識別要繫結的查詢字串欄位，初始化 類別的新具名執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new named instance of the class, using the specified string to identify which query-string field to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A使用所建立的物件建構函式會初始化具有指定的參數名稱來識別繫結的參數的查詢字串欄位。A object that is created by using the constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name that identifies the query-string field that the parameter binds to. 和屬性會初始化使用預設值。The and properties are initialized with default values. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立兩個物件使用建構函式並將其新增控制項的集合。The following example shows how to create two objects by using the constructor and add them to an control's collection. A控制項會顯示資料，如果`employee`和`country`查詢字串欄位會隨要求，而且它們是否有效的值。A control displays data if the `employee` and `country` query-string fields are passed with the request and if they have valid values. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2/CS/qsp2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2/VB/qsp2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的字串識別要繫結的查詢字串欄位，初始化 類別的新具名強型別 (Strongly Typed) 執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new named and strongly typed instance of the class, using the specified string to identify which query-string field to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A使用所建立的物件建構函式會使用指定的參數名稱、 參數類型和識別繫結的參數的查詢字串欄位的字串初始化。A object that is created by using the constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name, the parameter type, and a string that identifies the query-string field that the parameter binds to. 和屬性會初始化使用預設值。The and properties are initialized with default values. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立物件使用建構函式並將它加入控制項的集合。The following example shows how to create a object by using the constructor and add it to an control's collection. A控制項會顯示資料，如果`employee`和`country`查詢字串欄位會隨要求，而且它們是否有效的值。A control displays data if the `employee` and `country` query-string fields are passed with the request and if they have valid values. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3/CS/qsp3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3/VB/qsp3vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別使用的目前執行個體的值。The method calls the constructor to initialize a new instance of the class by using the values of the current instance.

param.name: context
param.span: 要求目前的 執行個體。

span.span: The current instance of the request.

param.name: control
param.span: 與 ASP.NET 網頁相關聯的 Web 伺服器控制項，其中會使用 物件。

span.span: A Web server control that is associated with the ASP.NET Web page where the object is used.
**Note** This parameter is not used.

summary.span: 更新並傳回 物件的值。

span.span: Updates and returns the value of the object.

returns.span: 物件，表示參數的目前值。

returns.span: 如果內容或要求為 ，則 方法會傳回 。

span.span: If the context or the request is , the method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會繫結至查詢字串欄位每次嘗試的方法呼叫。The object tries to bind to the query-string field every time that the method is called. `context`參數由用方法來擷取查詢字串中指定的查詢字串欄位的值。The `context` parameter is used by the method to retrieve the value of the specified query-string field from the query string. `control`參數已忽略。The `control` parameter is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public string QueryStringField { get; set; }
.property instance string QueryStringField
Public Property QueryStringField As String
public: property System::String ^ QueryStringField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定參數所繫結至的查詢字串欄位名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the query-string field that the parameter binds to.

value.span: 參數繫結的查詢字串欄位名稱。

span.span: The name of the query-string field that the parameter binds to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別與查詢字串一起傳遞的名稱/值組。The property identifies a name/value pair that is passed with the query string. 屬性會識別組的名稱，而在執行階段屬性繫結至其對應的值。The property identifies the name of the pair, whereas the property binds to its corresponding value at run time. 如果預期的查詢字串名稱/值組不會傳遞至查詢字串，包含頁面方法然後嘗試將參數繫結的值屬性。If the expected query-string name/value pair is not passed to the page with the query string, the method then tries to bind the parameter to the value of the property. 如果未設定屬性，方法時，無法將參數繫結的值。If the property is not set, the method fails to bind the parameter to a value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件搭配控制項來顯示資料控制項。The following example shows how to use a object together with a control to display data in a control. 屬性設定為預期的查詢字串欄位的名稱和參數加入至集合。The property is set to the name of the expected query-string field, and the parameter is added to the collection. A提供屬性，萬一名稱/值組不會傳遞包含查詢字串。A property is provided in case the name/value pair is not passed with the query string. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/CS/querystrparam1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/VB/querystrparam1vb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用物件搭配控制項來顯示資料控制項。The following example shows how to use a object together with a control to display data in a control. 物件加入至集合，以及其他用於輸出參數和傳回值的參數物件。The object is added to the collection, together with other parameter objects that are used for the output parameter and return value. 若要擷取資料時，處理從預存程序所傳回的值。To retrieve data, handle the values that are returned from the stored procedure. 這個程式碼範例是所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/CS/sql21cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/VB/sql21vb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ValidateInput { get; set; }
.property instance bool ValidateInput
Public Property ValidateInput As Boolean
public: property bool ValidateInput { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定是否正在驗證查詢字串參數的值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the value of the query string parameter is being validated or not.

value.span: 如果正在驗證查詢字串參數的值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the value of the query parameter is being validated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果頁面屬性設`true`，而屬性設定為`false`，將不會驗證查詢字串參數。If the page property is set to `true`, and the property is set to `false`, the query string parameter will not be validated. 不過，如果頁面屬性設`true`，和屬性設定為`true`，將會驗證查詢字串參數。However, if the page property is set to `true`, and the property is set to `true`, the query string parameter will be validated. 如果頁面屬性設`false`，將驗證查詢字串參數，而不論是否屬性設定為`true`或`false`。If the page property is set to `false`, the query string parameter will be validated regardless of whether the property is set to `true` or `false`.
